Rulings.Edison:
● If this card tributes itself, it won't be negated by "Skill Drain".
● When this card is Summoned during its controller's turn, its effect can be activated with ignition priority.
Rulings.Tengu:
● If this card tributes itself, it won't be negated by "Skill Drain".
● When this card is Summoned during its controller's turn, its effect can be activated with ignition priority.
